note: Employment is defined in line with the [13th ICLS](#dod:13-icls) and includes the production of goods for own use, such as subsistence farming.
title: Unemployment rate in people with vs. without disability
subtitle: Unemployment rate is the share of the [labor force](#dod:labor-force) without work, but actively looking for a job and available to start soon. A person with a disability is defined as someone limited in the kind or amount of activities they can do due to a long-term health problem.

display.name: Unemployment rate in persons without disability
Unemployment rate in persons with disability
